# `kanban`

Kanban task management system

## Usage

```bash
sc kanban --filter <type> --priority <level>
```

## Examples

```bash
sc kanban list
```

```bash
sc kanban todo "New task"
```

```bash
sc kanban stats
```

## Category

**General**

*This documentation is automatically generated from the live CLI system.*
